version_description: If you’ve had trouble opening Polar Flow app’s “General settings” on iPad, this release brings a fix for that.
This update brings support for firmware update for the Polar H10 heart rate sensor. For Polar M600 users we've added support for swimming metrics.
Fixed the issue where application closes unexpectedly with older iOS versions plus some other minor bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed the bug where some unsynced exercises were mistakenly erased during the device synchronization.

◆ POLAR SLEEP PLUS™
Let’s do a little bit of maths: Polar’s previous sleep analytics + new innovations = Polar Sleep Plus! Polar Sleep Plus automatically tracks the timing, amount, and quality of your sleep and gives you valuable sleep insights. You'll also receive sleep feedback so that you can make changes towards better sleep. PLEASE NOTE: for now, this feature is supported by Polar A370 and Polar M430.

◆ POLAR M430 COMPATIBILITY
Good news for those of you who are eagerly waiting to get your hands on our brand-new Polar M430 GPS running watch: the Polar Flow app is now ready for Polar M430.

◆ NEW TRAINING LIST VIEW
In addition to the existing weekly training view, this release brings a new training list view, where you can search and view all the training sessions that you’ve synced with Polar Flow.
This release brings a fix for the M430 users who were not offered an update to their wearable’s firmware via Polar Flow app.
If you’ve had trouble viewing training sessions’ routes in the Polar Flow web service, this release brings a fix for that.

◆ POLAR A370 COMPATIBILITY
We’re happy to announce that our brand-new Polar A370 fitness tracker is now supported by the Polar Flow app. Polar A370 helps you stay on the pulse 24/7 with continuous heart rate monitoring, advanced Polar Sleep Plus™ sleep tracking, and GPS via phone. Go to polar.com to find out more!
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.

◆ POLAR OH1 COMPATIBILITY
Yippee, this release brings compatibility for our brand-new Polar OH1 optical heart rate sensor. Polar OH1 tracks heart rate with Polar’s high-quality optical HR solution and transfers data via Bluetooth. Go to polar.com/oh1 to find out more!

◆ CONTINUOUS HEART RATE SUPPORT FOR POLAR M430
Yes, you read it correctly – the highly-awaited continuous heart rate feature is now available for Polar M430 and all the lucky M430 users can follow their 24/7 heart rate in the Polar Flow app.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Flow app. Happy training :)
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Polar Flow app.
If you’ve had trouble using ‘GPS from mobile’ feature on your Polar A370 with iOS 11, this release brings a fix for that.

◆ POLAR V800 AND STRAVA LIVE SEGMENTS (SLS)
Does this look familiar to you: “Approaching: SLS support for Polar V800 – 145 m”, “Segment start: SLS support for Polar V800” and “Segment completed: PR”? We’re super excited to announce that Polar V800 is now compatible with SLS!

◆ IPHONE X SUPPORT
We’ve good news for all the lucky iPhone X users: Polar Flow app has been optimized for Apple’s latest flagship and now you can fully enjoy the new OLED display while using the Flow app.
A few bugs were smashed to improve your experience of using the Polar Flow app. Happy training :)
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Flow app. Happy training :)
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.
Bug fixes.
We've smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Flow app. Happy training :)
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.

◆ NEW LES MILLS SPORT PROFILE
Are you ready for a modern version of classic balletic training? LES MILLS BARRE™ sport profile is now available on Polar Flow! It may look beautiful, but don’t underestimate the burn! Also, LES MILLS BODYVIVE™ sport profile changed to LES MILLS TONE™.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)
Bug fixes.

◆UPDATED PRIVACY NOTICE AND TERMS OF USE
Polar Flow is all about your training and hard work—moreover, your data. We want to be transparent in everything that we do, so we have updated our Privacy Notice and Terms of Use for Polar Flow.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.
This release brings the quality improvements for the Polar Flow app.

‘Share a link to Facebook’ option has been disabled due to Facebook API’s change. Nothing to worry about—you still can make your training alive by sharing a photo with the most important data of your recent session across many channels, such as Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)

◆ EXTENDED PRIVACY SETTINGS
This release brings the extended privacy settings to your Polar Flow account. From now on, you can individually select whether the privacy of your profile, sessions and activity summaries will be public, only visible to followers or private. Also, now you can make all your previous sessions as private in one tap.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)

◆ IMPROVED TRAINING SCHEDULING

Got too busy at work to do a planned workout? Or found something more interesting to do (not sure if it’s even possible)? No worries—now you can easily drag and drop your training targets. Also, with this release, you can quickly add a target to a specific day by simply clicking the ’plus’ icon next to your preferred day. Additionally, from now on, you can easily apply your favorite targets to specific days (create your favorite targets in the Polar Flow web service).

To top it all off, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)
If you’ve had trouble with crashing Polar Flow app, this release brings a fix for that.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Flow app. Happy training :)

◆ POLAR VANTAGE SERIES COMPATIBILITY
We’re thrilled to announce that the Polar Vantage series premium multisport GPS watches are now supported by the Polar Flow app. Go to polar.com/vantage to find out more!
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Flow app. Happy training! :)

Ho-ho-ho, holiday season is right around the corner and Santa decided to bring an early present to Polar Flow—the app has a new icon now.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training! :)
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience of using the Polar Flow app. Happy training :)
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training! :)
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training! :)

Always stay up-to-date with the latest Polar Flow app releases – from now on, you’ll get a notification inside the app once a new version is available for update.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training!

◆ POLAR H10 ANT+ COMPATIBILITY
Connection options with Polar H10 are about to be multiplied – now you can use it with ANT+ devices, such as cycling computers or gym equipment. To get the ANT+ functionality to your H10, simply update it to the latest firmware version using the Polar Flow app.

◆ POLAR VANTAGE SERIES ‘ACTIVITY’ UPDATE
If you’re a Polar Vantage series user, you may start to notice that your daily activity score is higher than before with the latest firmware update. We’ve now tweaked the activity tracking algorithm, and you should notice your accumulated activity will better reflect how active you’ve been during your day and reaching your activity goal should be easier.

Additionally, we’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Flow app. Happy training!
This release brings enhancements for your training privacy. Now you can easily see whether your workout is private or public and change the privacy straight from the ‘Training analysis’ view.
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.

◆ POLAR IGNITE COMPATIBILITY
We’re very excited to announce that this release brings compatibility for our brand new Polar Ignite – the new generation fitness watch with advanced wrist-based heart rate, integrated GPS, personalized daily workout guidance and nightly recovery measurement. Check out polar.com/ignite to find out more!
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training!
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training!
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
This release brings quality improvements to the Polar Flow app.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training!

We’ve improved the usability of adding favorite training targets to calendar. Additionally, we’ve included the possibility to change the language of your Polar watch in the device settings within the Flow app.

◆ NIGHTLY RECHARGE™ AND SLEEP PLUS STAGES™ FOR POLAR VANTAGE SERIES USERS
Measure your recovery from stress and training during the night with the Nightly Recharge™ recovery measurement as well as follow your sleep stages and get detailed sleep insights with the Sleep Plus Stages™ sleep tracking – now available for Vantage series users with the latest firmware update!

◆ DETAILED NIGHTLY RECHARGE ANS GRAPHS
If you have Polar Vantage series device or Polar Ignite, follow your sleeping heart rate, heart rate variability and breathing rate straight from the Polar Flow app with our new detailed ANS graphs.
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app. Happy training!
We’ve smashed a few bugs to improve your experience using the Polar Flow app with iOS 13. Happy training!

From now on, you can manage your Polar device’s favorite training targets, routes and Strava Live Segments straight in the Polar Flow app.

Happy training!

◆ POLAR VANTAGE SERIES 5.0 FIRMWARE UPDATE
Are you ready to give a try to Strava Live Segments (applicable to Polar Vantage V Titan and Polar Vantage V), Race Pace and FitSpark™ training guide (applicable to Polar Vantage series)? The 5.0 firmware update is available for the Vantage series right now.

Also, as we continue further development and improvements of the Polar Flow app, from this release we only support devices with iOS 12 or newer. If you're using iOS 11, you can continue using the app, but no new updates will be released on your device. We encourage iOS 11 users to upgrade to iOS 12 or newer to ensure receiving the latest updates and features.

Happy training!

◆ POLAR H9 COMPATIBILITY
Get connected & get going – this release brings compatibility for our brand new Polar H9 heart rate sensor. Bluetooth, ANT+ and 5 kHz technologies make H9 an ideal jack-of-all-trades heart rate sensor that connects to a large variety of apps and devices, such as Polar Beat, sports and smart watches, bike computers and gym equipment. Go to polar.com/h9 to find out more!
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.

◆ MANAGE YOUR FAVORITES

Manage all your favorite training targets, routes and Strava Live Segments in the new Favorites view. You can also save your new training targets to Favorites so that it’s easy to add them to your training diary.

Happy training!

◆ POLAR GRIT X COMPATIBILITY
We’re very excited to announce that this release brings compatibility for our brand new Polar Grit X – the outdoor multisport watch with rugged yet lightweight design, ultra-long battery life, real-time route guidance, FuelWise™ smart fueling assistant and Hill Splitter™ for detailed uphill and downhill stats.

Check out polar.com/grit-x to find out more!
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.
If you’ve had trouble to synchronize V650 with Flow app, this release brings fixes for that.
Time for a new training partner? We've added easy access to the Polar webshop for finding one. You can find Shop from the ‘More‘ section in the Polar Flow app.
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.

◆ POLAR UNITE COMPATIBILITY
We’re very excited to announce that this release brings compatibility for our brand new Polar Unite – the fitness watch with advanced wrist-based heart rate, nightly sleep and recovery measurement and personalized daily workout guidance.

Check out polar.com/unite to find out more!

◆ POLAR BLOG SECTION
Get fresh ideas, insight and inspiration straight from the Blog section in the Polar Flow app.
If you’ve had trouble to synchronize  with Flow app, this release brings fixes for that.
Polar Blog is now available in Spanish. If you are using your phone in Spanish, the 'Blog' section in the Polar Flow app will automatically switch to the new language.
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.

◆ POLAR VANTAGE V2 COMPATIBILITY
This release brings compatibility for our brand new Polar Vantage V2 - a lightweight premium multisport watch with all of Polar’s sports expertise in one package.

Check out polar.com/vantage/v2 to find out more!
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.

We're excited to bring you the new Diary view! In one single view, you get the latest data and insights of your training, activity, recovery and sleep summarized super conveniently and intuitively.
We’re also stepping up the Flow app, this is the last release for iOS 12. For new Flow app features and fixes, update to iOS 13 or newer.

Feed view is now removed. But don't worry, you can still share your training sessions with your friends!

By opening the training session and selecting the share button, you can share the training result with a photo or share a link to the training via WhatsApp, Facebook and other messaging apps you have on your phone.

◆ VERITY SENSE COMPATIBILITY
We’re excited to announce that this release brings compatibility with our brand new Polar Verity Sense – Premium optical heart rate sensor that tracks your heart rate super conveniently. Whatever your sport, with Verity Sense you never miss a beat!

◆ RECORD WORKOUTS WITH FLOW
Now you can use the Flow app on its own to track workouts. Flow app uses the phone’s GPS to track your route, pace and distance. Pair a Polar heart rate sensor to see live heart rate and calories.

We’re excited to announce that this release brings compatibility with our brand new Polar Vantage M2 and Ignite 2!

Designed for function, the Polar Vantage M2 works as hard as you do. Our industry-leading technology is here to help you reach your goals and come back stronger.

A fitness watch that’s sleek, simple and smart? The Ignite 2 is a true triple threat. Versatile and full of great features, it’s the perfect companion for any sport and any lifestyle.

Check out polar.com to find out more!
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.

Now you can check the battery level status of Polar heart rate sensor from the settings in Training Start -view.

This release also brings bug fixes to the app.
This release brings bug fixes to the Polar Flow app.
